languages.text: Гемункул обрек четырех провидцев на чудовищные страдания, заперев их разумы в одном теле. Встреча с Вольным Торговцем прервала их мучения... Так или иначе.

traits.locale_text: Гемункул обрек четырех провидцев на чудовищные страдания, заперев их разумы в одном теле. Встреча с Вольным Торговцем прервала их мучения... Так или иначе.

languages.text: The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.
languages.original_text: Гемункул обрек четырех провидцев на чудовищные страдания, заперев их разумы в одном теле. Встреча с Вольным Торговцем прервала их мучения... Так или иначе.

traits.locale_text: The Haemonculus condemned the four seers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... One way or another.
The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.
The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.

languages.text: L'hémoncule a condamné quatre Grands Prophètes à de terribles souffrances en enfermant leurs esprits dans un seul et même corps. Leur rencontre avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a mis fin à leur tourment... d'une manière ou d'une autre.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.

traits.locale_text: L'hémoncule a condamné quatre Grands Prophètes à de terribles souffrances en enfermant leurs esprits dans un seul et même corps. Leur rencontre avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a mis fin à leur tourment... d'une manière ou d'une autre.

languages.text: 血伶人将四名先知的意识塞进了同一具身体之中，让他们遭受了巨大的痛苦。当他们遇到行商浪人之后，无论发生了什么事情……他们的痛苦总归是结束了。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.

traits.locale_text: 血伶人将四名先知的意识塞进了同一具身体之中，让他们遭受了巨大的痛苦。当他们遇到行商浪人之后，无论发生了什么事情……他们的痛苦总归是结束了。

languages.text: ハモンキュラスは4人の先見司の心を1つの体に閉じ込めて恐ろしい苦しみを与えた。自由開拓者との出会いは…いずれにしても、その苦しみに終止符を打ったのだ。
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.

traits.locale_text: ハモンキュラスは4人の先見司の心を1つの体に閉じ込めて恐ろしい苦しみを与えた。自由開拓者との出会いは…いずれにしても、その苦しみに終止符を打ったのだ。

languages.text: Der Haemonculus hat vier Runenpropheten zu grauenhaftem Leid verurteilt, indem er den Verstand aller in einen einzigen Körper eingeschlossen hat. Ihre Begegnung mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} hat ihren Qualen ein Ende gesetzt ...
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.

traits.locale_text: Der Haemonculus hat vier Runenpropheten zu grauenhaftem Leid verurteilt, indem er den Verstand aller in einen einzigen Körper eingeschlossen hat. Ihre Begegnung mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} hat ihren Qualen ein Ende gesetzt ...

languages.text: El Hemónculo condenó a cuatro videntes a un sufrimiento atroz al sellar sus mentes en un único cuerpo. Su encuentro con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha puesto fin a su tormento... de una forma u otra.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.

traits.locale_text: El Hemónculo condenó a cuatro videntes a un sufrimiento atroz al sellar sus mentes en un único cuerpo. Su encuentro con {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha puesto fin a su tormento... de una forma u otra.

languages.text: Haimonkulus, zihinlerini tek bir bedene kilitleyerek Ötesezenleri inanılmaz bir acıya mahkûm etti. Hür Tacir'le karşılaşmaları, eziyetlerini bir şekilde sona erdirdi.
languages.original_text: The Haemonculus condemned four Farseers to monstrous suffering by locking their minds in one body. Their encounter with the Rogue Trader ended their torment... one way or another.
